players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso and I investigated him. Trust me."
Charlie: "I don't think Bob is the mafioso. Diana's claim seems suspicious to me."
Diana: "I stand by my investigation of Bob. I have evidence that he is the mafioso."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
